gov.nih.nlm.ling.composition

Class ScalarModalityValueComposition

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.composition.ScalarModalityValueComposition

  • public class ScalarModalityValueComposition
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that includes static methods for scalar modality value composition. It assumes that a Predication has already been formed, and that we need to calculate its modality value.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getModalScale

        public static ScalarModalityValue.ScaleType getModalScale(Predication pred)
        Finds the modality scale appropriate for the predication.
        Parameters:
        pred - the predication whose scale to find
        Returns:
        the scale of the predication, or null if the predicate is invalid

      • propagateScalarModalityValues

        public static void propagateScalarModalityValues(Predication pred)
        Propagates the scalar modality value for the predications in the scope of the pred predication.
        Parameters:
        pred - the predication whose scale/value to propagate

      • getScopalArguments

        public static java.util.List<SemanticItem> getScopalArguments(Predication pred)
        Returns the arguments of a predication that are under its scope. It returns an empty list if the predication has no arguments or no in-scope arguments.
        Parameters:
        pred - the predication
        Returns:
        the arguments of the predication under its scopal influence

      • updateScaleValues

        public static void updateScaleValues(ScalarModalityValueComposition.ScaleShift shiftType,
                                     java.util.List<ScalarModalityValue> scalarValues)
        Update the scale values associated with a predication, according to a scale shifting operation
        Parameters:
        shiftType - the scale shifting operation (NEGATE, INCREASE, LOWER, HEDGE)
        scalarValues - the scalar values associated with a predication
